freebase-python provides an easy way to acces [http://www.freebase.com/ freebase.com]'s API.

= A Simple Example =
Let's just make a simple read query for freebase.
{{{
import freebase
r = freebase.mqlread({
    "name" : "The Beatles",
    "type" : "/music/artist",
    "album" : []
})
}}}

We could do the same for sandbox.freebase.com.
{{{
import sandbox
r = sandbox.mqlread({
    "name" : "The Beatles",
    "type" : "/music/artist",
    "album" : []
})
}}}
